job_tasks.phrase: The focus is on enabling customers to manage their accounts and subscriptions from a single licence to large enterprises with thousands of users.
job_tasks.justification: Describes the business context and goals for the software landscape, focusing on customer management and business scalability.

job_tasks.phrase: This requires maintaining a software landscape that owns the identity and access management, subscriptions & billing, conversion, retention optimisation and reconciliation with our financial systems.
job_tasks.justification: Refers to the ongoing maintenance and ownership of core business software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: We support this infrastructure for current and future use cases for our existing products, with the aim of anticipating and accelerating the company's revenue growth expectations through technology.
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the strategic goal of using technology to drive revenue growth and support future business needs.

job_tasks.phrase: The Principal Engineer will own and drive technical decisions to ensure the scalability, reliability, availability and security of our internal systems and enterprise revenue platforms within Business Technology to build, commission and deploy the technology and data infrastructure and architecture to meet business revenue growth objectives.
job_tasks.justification: Encompasses owning technical decisions, ensuring system qualities (scalability, reliability, etc.), and building/deploying infrastructure and architecture.

job_tasks.phrase: By defining a path to implementation, this role should ensure that product decisions and planning are carried out in a scalable manner.
job_tasks.justification: Relates to planning and executing technical implementations in a scalable way.

job_tasks.phrase: The Principal will challenge implementation, ensure execution alongside management and establish a collaborative path with other tracks in the engineering organisation.
job_tasks.justification: Involves technical oversight, ensuring execution, and working across teams.

job_tasks.phrase: Facilitate the overall architecture of our business systems across teams, system owners and engineers
job_tasks.justification: Directly refers to defining and guiding the system architecture.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide guidance on the architecture and its components through the commissioning and decommissioning of all services involved
job_tasks.justification: Involves providing architectural guidance and managing the lifecycle of services.

job_tasks.phrase: Ownership of revenue data management: Data architecture, governance, data protection, etc
job_tasks.justification: Pertains to managing data architecture, governance, and protection, which falls under data management.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide hands-on technical leadership on projects with a size and scope of +5 teams
job_tasks.justification: Refers to leading technical projects and teams.

job_tasks.phrase: Helping teams plan and estimate activities
job_tasks.justification: Involves project planning and estimation for technical activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Supporting and challenging a realistic roadmap with team leads and product managers, challenging timelines and providing predictability of deliverables to the business
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on strategic planning, roadmap definition, timeline management, and business predictability.

job_tasks.phrase: Mentor, develop and coach other senior software engineers, engineering managers and business leaders
job_tasks.justification: Relates to developing and guiding other professionals.

soft_skills.phrase: Open communication, regular feedback: as a language-focused company, we value the importance of clear, honest communication. We value smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback, and believe that leading with empathy makes us better together.
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions communication, feedback, and collaboration.
The phrase 'work with other teams' directly maps to collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Annual learning budget: because we never stop learning, we've set up an annual budget for your professional development-pick a learning path which contributes to your career development and we'll back you up.
soft_skills.justification: Highlights continuous learning and professional development.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement describes a Principal Software Engineer role focused on building and scaling business-critical systems such as identity management, subscriptions, and billing. The responsibilities and technologies listed are entirely within the domain of traditional software engineering and data infrastructure, with no mention of AI, ML, or Generative AI models or techniques. Therefore, the role aligns with the 'Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job description is exceptionally clear and detailed, explicitly outlining a focus on business technology, scalability, and revenue platforms. There is no mention of AI, ML, or GenAI, making the classification unambiguous.
